pages.text: $(li)The Booflo Hide is an item that can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:utility/endergetic/boof_block)Boof Blocks$(/l) and the $(l:patchouli:armors/booflo_vest)Booflo Vest$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:pets/the_endergetic_expansion/booflo)Booflos$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
